WorkItem.Description:
Currently Point/Size and Rectangle are redefined. When moving the QrCodeControl.cs and Renderer.cs into the assembly there are numerous naming clashes with System.Drawing.

 

From what i see the main reason of having a separate class is the ToString() visualization in the debugger.

 

Suggestion is to either rename the internal classes, use fully qualified names (like System.Drawing.Point) or just swap them for the System.Drawing ones.

 

wvd_vegt
WorkItem.Summary: Rename Size/Point etc so they do not clash with System.Drawing
